articles.title: Four Britons evacuated from cruise ship treated for coronavirus

articles.title: Trump administration weighs emergency funds to combat coronavirus
articles.description: Officials say the White House is considering asking Congress for emergency funding to ramp up response.
articles.content: The Trump administration is considering asking legislators for emergency funding to ramp up its response to the fast-spreading coronavirus, a White House spokesman and an administration source said on Monday, though they did not say how much money was needed.… [+3164 chars]

articles.title: Legislator from Iran's Qom alleges virus coverup
articles.description: The member of parliament claims there have been 50 deaths from the virus, while the government says there have been 12.
articles.content:
